Uses of Interface
popt4jlib.MSSC.ClustererTerminationIntf

  • Packages that use ClustererTerminationIntf 
    Package Description
    popt4jlib.MSSC
    Package implements algorithms for Minimum-Sum-of-Square(-Errors)-Clustering, a well-defined optimization problem.

    • Uses of ClustererTerminationIntf in popt4jlib.MSSC

      Classes in popt4jlib.MSSC that implement ClustererTerminationIntf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClustererTerminationNoCenterMove
      specifies that a clustering process must stop when two successive calls of isDone() the centers found by the associated clusterer have not moved at all.
      class  ClustererTerminationNoMove
      specifies that the clustering process may end when in two successive calls of the isDone() method, no vector has changed its assignment to another cluster.
      class  ClustererTerminationNumIters
      specifies that the clustering process will stop after a fixed number of calls to the isDone() method.
